Discussions.Discussion_Name: New Date for the Consultation Hour from 06.05.

Messages.Author: Tim Joshua Grundmann
Messages.Content: Hello again,  We resolved the confusion regarding the date for the consultation hour. From next week on (06.05.) i will be at the E-N 191 every Monday from 14:15 to 15:45. The additional consultation hour today still happens at the E-N 004.  Greetings Tim

Messages.Author: Tim Joshua Grundmann
Messages.Content: Hey everybody, Sorry for not appearing during the consultation hour. There was a miscommunication about the date, which I noticed too late. I'm now available at the ZECM PC-Pool (E-N 004) until 16:00 and tomorrow from 14:15-15:45 also at the E-N 004. Greetings, Tim

Messages.Author: Hans Niklas Jacob
Messages.Content: Hello Everybody, since the TEL building is closed until further notice we are now always using the BH-N 128 room! There is one notable exception: Next week the Wednesday the 1st of May is a holiday and therefore we'll meet on Thursday the 2nd of May at 12:00 (to 14:00) in MAR 0.010 instead. Greetings, Niklas

Messages.Author: Hans Niklas Jacob
Messages.Content: Hello Everybody, due to the TEL building being closed on the 17th of April (first meeting), we will meet in the room BH-N 128. See you tomorrow, Niklas
